item.title: The Top New Android 16 Features (2025): How to Install, Features, Release Date
item.description: Android 16 is now available for select phones today. Here are the features we're most excited about.

item.title: A Google Shareholder is Suing the Company Over the TikTok Ban
item.description: Silicon Valley software engineer Tony Tan says his battle against Google and the Trump administration is about upholding the rule of law.

item.title: The ‘Long-Term Danger’ of Trump Sending Troops to the LA Protests
item.description: President Trump’s deployment of more than 700 Marines to Los Angeles—following ICE raids and mass protests—has ignited a fierce national debate over s...

item.title: Airlines Don’t Want You to Know They Sold Your Flight Data to DHS
item.description: A contract obtained by 404 Media shows that an airline-owned data broker forbids the feds from revealing it sold them detailed passenger data.

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
item.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”
